Texts.Chs: 我显然是自己把自己裹在鸡肉里。
Texts.Eng: I apparently covered myself in chickens.

Texts.Chs: 我没有从上次的事情中学到什么。阿图查给了我一些他的午餐。我吃了块操****石头。
Texts.Eng: I didn't learn from last time. Atucha offered me some of his lunch. I ate a ****ing rock.

Texts.Chs: 我昨晚喝**** ***醉了,醒来一身都是鸡肉。到底是谁干的。
Texts.Eng: I got **** *** drunk last night and woke up covered in chickens. Who did this.

Texts.Chs: 提醒自己: 血肉收割者可不是好宠物。
Texts.Eng: Note to self: Flesh Reapers do not make good pets.

Texts.Chs: 令人惊讶的是，它没有包含真正的科学
Texts.Eng: Surprisingly, it contains no actual science

Texts.Chs: 假设: 我可以让我的同事阿图查醉如泥，以至于泄露秘密。但事实并非如此。维纳莉丝对我很生气。
Texts.Eng: The hypothesis: I could get my coworker Atucha extremely drunk to the point of revealing secrets. That's not what happened though. Vinalisj is very angry at me.

Texts.Chs: 今天我竟然敢吃那个瘾君子拉迪恩卖的土。只是些灰尘而已。我的钱花得不值。
Texts.Eng: Today I was dared to eat the dirt that that druggie Radien sells. It's just dirt. I didn't get my money's worth.

Texts.Chs: 事实证明，对于辐射人来说，污垢是一种强大的毒品。我有个主意。
Texts.Eng: Turns out that dirt is a powerful drug to Radien. I have an idea.
